remarks: A relationship between the rank function and the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` .  Proposition 9.15(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement:
rankid.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
rankr1 $p |- ( B = ( rank ` A ) <-> ( -. A e. ( R1 ` B ) /\ A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) $.
